price: Kwa sababu Mola wake Mlezi ameifunulia!
footnotes: Kwani Mlezi wake na Muumba wake atakuwa kaifunulia, kaipa Wahyi, na kaiamuru itetemeke na ijisuke suke, ndio ikafanya upesi kutekeleza amri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
